name: Magical Boys
description:
A short and ridiculous game about three young boys who suddenly gain magical abilities, but have to fight in frilly outfits before their powers really work.

Ludum Dare #31 Jam entry! Please realize this means I had 72 hours to make this, and I do have a life and need sleep, so it's probably closer to 48-40 hours at the very most.

Sleepless is by DuttonsaysHi (permission to use was granted)

This game was made using Ren'Py!
